description:
Well-known “Emergency Exit character”, “Picto”-san had a story!?
　
Find the “Picto”-san that fits the theme, which fills the screen with human (picto) relationship!
A brand new type of picture quiz you have never seen before!
　
Stages are filled and configured with daily event scenes such as “Medical check up”,“sports festival” and fantasy event scenes like “zombie train”,“treasure island”
　
If you can find out where “Picto”-san is, you can read an funny fact related to “Picto”-san
　
Compete with your family or friends who will find first, and also recommended for video streaming by streamers!
name: I SEEK! WHERE IS "PICTO"-SAN?
